slide.title: TRY … CATCH … FINALLY
slide.example: line #* E I O op return operands 3 0 E > ECHO 'in+try' 1 > JMP |00dd00|->7| 4 2 *E > > CATCH* 'Exception1', !0, |dd00dd|->5| 5 3 > ECHO 'exception+1+thrown' 4 > JMP |00dd00|->7| 6 |dd00dd|5| *E > > CATCH* 'Exception2', !0 7 6 > ECHO 'exception+2+thrown' 8 |00dd00|7 > > FAST_CALL| ->9 8 > > JMP ->11 9 |0000dd|9 > ECHO 'in+finally'| |0000dd|10 > FAST_RET| 11 11 > ECHO 'after' 12 > RETURN 1
